message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40.  What do you say?
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky!  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 30. Take it or leave it, but remember the money is losing value fast for both of us!
Okay Bob, let's be realistic. I'll take 55, you get 45.  This is my final offer!
